column4: How can I configure a cronjob, that runs every 25 hours (not 24!!) and which should be run let's say 5 times. Is this possible?
what do you mean by "run 5 times"
Well it should run now then after 25 hours then after 50 hours then after 75 ... and a last time after 125 hours from now on.
and then what? if you only want it to run 5 times, and then never again use at
